prTitle: feat: define Watcher interface and common FileEvent types
prBody:
## Summary

- Adds `internal/watcher/watcher.go` with the `Watcher` interface (`Watch(paths []string) error`, `Stop() error`, `Events() <-chan FileEvent`), `FileEvent` struct (FilePath, PID, UID, Username, EventType, Timestamp), and `EventType` constants (`EventRead`, `EventWrite`)
- Adds `internal/watcher/file_watcher.go` with `WatcherConfig`, `NewWatcher` constructor, and the `baseWatcher` no-op fallback that satisfies the interface on all platforms
- Establishes the `platformFactory` registration hook so future platform-specific files (`file_watcher_linux.go`, `file_watcher_darwin.go`) can inject their inotify/FSEvents constructors via `init()` without modifying shared files
- Documents build-tag conventions used by task-2 platform implementations

Closes #159
